reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the adoption of a roadmap in Sichuan province on the development of alternative energy sources in China

description.narrative: The project is designed to support Sichuan's adoption of a roadmap to support its development of alternative energy sources. The implementer will produce recommendations to Sichuan's government on improving regulations for shale gas development. It is intended that this leads to Sichuan's adoption of the recommendations, leading to a national pilot project in 2-3 years time.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
